name: Find the Phrase
description:
The most UNIQUE and CREATIVE puzzle quiz on the market. Flex your gaming muscle and dive into a world of puzzles. Use your brain to guess each word puzzle, pun or riddle. Instant satisfaction after each successful solve. Complete every puzzle to win. Stuck? Use hints when you simply "can't even". Flip the screen, scramble the letters or ask a friend - when all else fails.

Our puzzles are fun, creative, unconventional, overly-simple, hilariously-hard, unusually silly, zany and most importantly, challenging.

HINTS:
- Magic Fill
- Remove Letters
- Auto Solve

FEATURES:
- Free to Play (with in-app purchases)
- Minimal Advertisements
- Promotes Creative Thinking
- 100+ Levels of Pure Brain Teasers
- Picture Puzzles

Everything you know is wrong. Rethink everything you know in this amazing puzzle game from the good folks at HYPER! Interactive.

Download this perplexing puzzle game, today!
